articles.author: Jack Durschlag
articles.title: Kansas man gets 55 years in prison for shooting girlfriend, stealing her car, fleeing: reports
articles.description: A Wichita, Kan., man, who in August 2018 shot and wounded his girlfriend and stole her car before fleeing to New Mexico, was sentenced to more than 55 years in state prison, a published report Wednesday said.
articles.content:
A Wichita, Kan., man, who in August 2018 shot and wounded his girlfriend and stole her car before fleeing to New Mexico, was sentenced to more than 55 years in state prison, according to a report.
